short_desc: DECEMBER 21st 2013  - Holiday Party and Toy Distribution (children 13 and under) starting at 11am. Children must be present to receive gifts. DECEMBER 24th 2013 - Holiday Meal will be served at 12 noon. Everyone is welcome.
